name: JNC-API
short_description: The Java Nessus Client API is a Nessus Transfer Protocol 1.2 Implementation. The JNC-API includes: NTP 1.2 Specification (.en, .de), Java API Documentation (.en), JNC-API Binary / Source, Handbook (.de), GUI Nessus Client (Source Only, Prototype)
